snake

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • snake.squares
      • snake.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loggable, Updateable

    public final class Grid
extends squares
implements Updateable, Loggable
    Number crunching class that contains all fundamental game components

      • getNeighbors

        public int getNeighbors(int x,
                        int y,
                        int type,
                        int radius)
        Specified by:
        getNeighbors in class squares
        Parameters:
        x - the x component of the chosen space
        y - the y component of the chosen space
        type - the spaces which contain an int matching type will be counted
        radius - the number of spaces out from the initial, e.g. a radius of one will count squares in a 3x3 box excluding the middle square
        Returns:
        the number of occupied spaces matching param type near (x, y)

      • getNeighbors

        public int getNeighbors(int x,
                        int y,
                        int type)
        Description copied from class: squares
        see getNeighbors(int x, int y, int type, int radius)
        Specified by:
        getNeighbors in class squares
        Parameters:
        x - The column number
        y - The row number
        type - Which neighbors should be counted
        Returns:
        same as getNeighbors(int x, int y, int type, int radius), but with implied radius 1
